info.name: Steam - Sparkling Levels
info.description: Important: Click the "Show Css Code" button first. The install button will work after that. I highly recommend this style that makes the "Show Css Code" button much easier to find. â€• Another style from yours truly, adding a little bit of fanciness to Steam levels from level 0 to 1000 and beyond. Version: 1.0.1 | View change logs
info.additionalInfo: This style was created for my personal preferences. There's not much else to say about it. You can find this style embedded already in other styles related to Steam such as Steam Enhancer Plus and Steam Holiday profiles.
